cleaned_text: Improving Your Immune System by Getting a Chiropractic Adjustment Caring for your immune system has never been more critical than it is in today's environment. Our bodies are constantly under attack from outside bacteria and viruses that can lead to many different illnesses. It's become almost second nature for many to head to their primary care provider once they start to feel under the weather. Unfortunately, that requires taking medications that simply mask symptoms of illness and that don't necessarily help you attack and rid your body of the invading source. On the other hand, chiropractic care focuses on helping boost the body's immune systems to naturally fight against invading bodies and help you maintain optimal health. The Importance of Chiropractic Care for the Immune System Chiropractic care is designed to treat and [support the whole person](http://www.chiropractic.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/ICA-Report-on-Immune-Function-and-Chiropractic-3-20-20.pdf), not just specific ailments. While more scientific study needs to be done, research has shown that chiropractic adjustments can improve the body's nervous system, which does play an essential role in your immune health. So, how do [chiropractic adjustments](https://www.spine-health.com/treatment/chiropractic/chiropractic-adjustment) help boost your immune system? By returning your body to its proper alignment. This allows your body to move vital fluids, oxygen, white blood cells, and other nutrients throughout the body, especially to areas that need it the most. These natural materials help the body fend off foreign bodies, such as bacteria and viruses, and help repair any damage within the body that could be causing illness.
